vertexAuthEnabled.desc: Turn vertex level authorization on or off.

powerGroups.desc: An array of groups that can override scoping in some situations.

privileged.desc: An array of groups that can have elevated permissions depending on placement in the code.

accountManagers.desc: An array of groups that manage user accounts.

directories.desc: Directory locations that are relevant to user permissions based files.
directories.example: Fully qualified path to the directories.

cachable.desc: If there is a purpose built scoping cache for this class, is it enabled?
cachable.example: The key is the class the value is true or false for enabling the cache.  It can be a super class.
